entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
